text.text: You've been so in love with the princess, but a witch cursed you and now you two can't recognize each other.
Ever since then, you've been called the 'frog'. Like the unfortunate character from the popular fairy take
☑️ TASK: Head over heels for the princess
You can't live like this. You have to find the princess.
Get her kiss to lift the curse so you can see each other as you could before.
Exchange signatures so you can finally get married!
But be careful, if the fiancee finds out who you are, they may harm you very badly.
Make sure that the princess doesn't die under any circumstance.
Her life is more important to you than yours!
